item.title: Python Setup
item.description: table, td, th { border: 1px solid grey; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border-collapse: collapse; } table {width: 80%; } Light-weighted conda installer miniforge is the community (conda-forge) driven minimalistic conda installer.

item.title: Install Tensorflow on Apple Silicon
item.description: Necessary tools before the installation: Homebrew, XCode tools, and Miniforge (arm64 Apple Silicon).
